Adaptive Tactics.description: Changes weakness when weakness is struck

Ally Counter.description: Chance of countering with weak normal attack for ally

Ally Retaliate.description: Chance of countering with heavy normal attack for ally

Attack Knowhow.description: Demon with this skill can use attack items in battle

Bad Company.description: Summons highest level demons from the stock

Blood Ritual.description: Luster Candy to self by 1 level, reduces HP to 1

Charge.description: Boosts damage of next physical or gun attack by 150%

Concentrate.description: Boosts damage of next magical attack by 150%

Counter.description: Chance of countering with weak normal attack

Critical Eye.description: Guaruntees critical hit for next physical or gun attack

Dark Pierce.description: All dark attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Dream Raga.description: 70% Sleep, panic, and/or charm and rakunda

Elec Pierce.description: All elec attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Endure.description: Survives with 1 HP restored after suffering a fatal blow once per battle

Enduring Soul.description: Survives with full HP restored after suffering a fatal blow once per battle

Enlightenment.description: Changes weakness attributes to absorb for one turn, luster candy and induce smirk to self when corresponding element absorbed

Estoma.description: Negates enemy encounters for some time

Eternal Rest.description: Instant death to all enemies inflicted with sleep

FIERCE STANCE.description: Removes two press turns from the enemy during their next turn

Fire Pierce.description: All fire attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Force Pierce.description: All force attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Frenzied Chomp.description: Chance of poison, bind, or charm

Growing Hate.description: Power dependent on enemy dark resistance

Hard Worker.description: Increases experience points received after battles

Healing Knowhow.description: Demon with this skill can use healing items in battle

Ice Pierce.description: All ice attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Imposing Stance.description: Removes one press turn from the enemy during their next turn

Invitation.description: Summons or returns another allied demon and revives the demon if dead

Light Pierce.description: All light attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Makarakarn.description: Repels magical attacks except ailment or almighty for one turn

Null Mind.description: Immunity against sleep, panic, charm, and mute ailments

Null Nerve.description: Immunity against poison, bind, sick and daze ailments

Pestilence.description: Heavy damage on enemies suffering from ailments

Phys Pierce.description: All physical attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Pierce Gun.description: All gun attacks can pierce through drain, repel, null and resist attributes

Recarmdra.description: Caster dies, fully revives and recovers other active allies

Retaliate.description: Chance of countering with heavy normal attack

Sabbatma.description: Summons or returns another allied demon

Self-Righteous Vow.description: Luster candy to self when weakness is exploited

Shivering Taboo.description: 70% Bind, panic, sleep, sick and/or poison

Smile Charge.description: Bestows smirk. Cannot use when target is under effect of any ailment

Strange Ray.description: Almighty attack which damages current MP by half

Tetraja.description: Shields Light or Dark attacks for one attack

Tetrakarn.description: Repels physical or gun attacks for one turn

Venomous Raga.description: 70% Poison, sick, and/or bind and tarunda

Victory Cry.description: Recovers HP and MP fully after victory

Warding Shout.description: Negates ailment affliction for one turn

Will of Flame.description: Grants fire pierce for one turn

Will of Frost.description: Grants ice pierce for one turn

Will of Thunder.description: Grants elec pierce for one turn

Will of Wind.description: Grants force pierce for one turn

Workaholic.description: Greatly increases experience points received after battles
